Lease Summary.Resident Names: Please list all the tenants listed on the lease; just bulleted names
Lease Summary.Property Manager/Landlord Name: What is the Property Manager/Landlord Name?
Lease Summary.Property Manager/Landlord Phone Number: What is the Property Manager/Landlord Phone Number? Please only return the phone number in the (000) 000-0000 format
Lease Summary.Property Manager/Landlord Phone Email: What is the Property Manager/Landlord Email
Lease Summary.Emergency Maintenance Phone Number: What is the phone number to call for emergency maintenance issues? Please only return the phone number in the (000) 000-0000 format
Lease Summary.Rent Amount: What is the monthly rent amount? Please return the number only and nothing else in the $0,000.00 format
Lease Summary.Rent Due Date: What day of the month is rent due? Please return it in the following format: 10th of the month
Lease Summary.Pet Included on Lease: Does the tenant have a pet included in their lease?

Timeline.Lease Signed Date: In the least amount of words possible, what is the date that the tenant and landlord countersigned the lease? Please return the date only and nothing else in the MMMM, DD, YYYY format
Timeline.Lease Start Date: In the least amount of words possible, what is the lease start date? Please return the date only and nothing else in the MMMM, DD, YYYY format
Timeline.Move-in Inspection Deadline Date: In the least amount of words possible, what is the move-inspection deadline date? Please return the date only and nothing else in the MMMM, DD, YYYY format
Timeline.Notice to Vacate Date: In the least amount of words possible, what is the notice to vacate deadline date? Please return the date only and nothing else in the MMMM, DD, YYYY format
Timeline.Lease End Date: In the least amount of words possible, what is the lease end date? Please return the date only and nothing else in the MMMM, DD, YYYY format
Timeline.Security Deposit Return Date: In the least amount of words possible, when is the deadline date for the landlord to return the security deposit? Please return the date only and nothing else in the MMMM, DD, YYYY format

Red Flags.Resident Names: Is there a list of all the tenants in the lease? Yes/No
Red Flags.Property Manager/Landlord Name: Is the Property Manager/Landlord Name listed in the lease? Yes/No
Red Flags.Lease Start Date: Does the lease have a start date listed in the lease? Yes/No
Red Flags.Rent Amount: Is the monthly rent amount listed in the lease? Yes/No
Red Flags.Rent Due Date: Is the day rent is due listed in the lease? Yes/No
Red Flags.Rent Payment Instructions: Are the payment instructions listed in the lease? Yes/No
Red Flags.Full Address: Is the full address of the property listed in the lease? Yes/No
Red Flags.Notice to Vacate Date: Does the lease have a notice to vacate date listed in the lease? Yes/No
Red Flags.Security Deposit Amount: Is the security deposit amount listed in the lease? Yes/No
Red Flags.Counter-Signature: Has the lease been signed by both parties? Yes/No
Red Flags.Pet Policy: Is a pet policy listed in the lease? Yes/No
Red Flags.Notice to Enter Rules: Are the notice to enter rules listed in the lease? Yes/No
Red Flags.Utilities Responsibilities: Does the lease mention who pays for utilities? Yes/No

Rent and Fees.Rent Amount: What is the monthly rent amount? Please return the number only and nothing else in the $0,000.00 format
Rent and Fees.Rent Due Date: What day of the month is rent due? Please return it in the following format: 10th of the month
Rent and Fees.Pet Rent Amount: What is the monthly pet rent amount? Please return the number only and nothing else in the $0,000.00 format
Rent and Fees.Pet Deposit Amount: What is the monthly pet deposit amount? Please return the number only and nothing else in the $0,000.00 format
Rent and Fees.Late Fee Policy: In the most concise format, what is the complete late fee policy in a paragraph format? Only include information about the late fee and nothing else.
Rent and Fees.Late Fee if 1 Day Late: Based on the late fee policy terms, what will be the calculated late fee if the tenant pays their rent on the first of the month? Please return the number only and nothing else in the $0,000.00 format
Rent and Fees.Late Fee if 3 Days Late: Based on the late fee policy terms, what will be the calculated late fee if the tenant pays their rent on the third of the month? Please return the number only and nothing else in the $0,000.00 format
Rent and Fees.Late Fee if 5 Days Late: Based on the late fee policy terms, what will be the calculated late fee if the tenant pays their rent on the fifth of the month? Please return the number only and nothing else in the $0,000.00 format
Rent and Fees.Late Fee if 10 Days Late: Based on the late fee policy terms, what will be the calculated late fee if the tenant pays their rent on the tenth of the month? Please return the number only and nothing else in the $0,000.00 format
Rent and Fees.State Rules for Maximum Late Fee: [Pull from State Law tab (Column C) based on state lease is in]
Rent and Fees.State Rules for Mandatory Grace Period: [Pull from State Law tab (Column D) based on state lease is in]
Rent and Fees.State Rules for Filing Eviction: [Pull from State Law tab (Column E) based on state lease is in]
Rent and Fees.Lost Key Fee: What is the fee if the tenant loses the key? Please return the number only and nothing else in the $0,000.00 format
Rent and Fees.Non-Sufficient Funds / Returned Check Fe: What is the fee for returned checks or non-sufficient funds (NSF)? Please return the number only and nothing else in the $0,000.00 format
Rent and Fees.Other Fees:
What is the complete list of fees the tenant can be responsible for? Please search all pages in the document, including all addendums. Do not include late fee, NSF fee, returned check fee, or lost key fee in the list. Return the list in the following format:
Fee Name: Amount (in $0,000.00 format)

Move-In.Deadline to complete move-in inspection: Is there a deadline to complete a move-in inspection?
Move-In.Time to report pest issues upon move-in: Upon move-in, how long do I have to report pest issues?
Move-In.Utilities setup before move-in: Do I need to set up utilities before move in?
Move-In.Mailbox keys information: What does the lease say about mailbox keys?
Move-In.Lease includes parking: How many parking spots do I have access to in my lease?
Move-In.Access to amenities or facilities: Besides parking, what other amenities or facilities do I have access to in my lease? Please return them in a bulleted format only
Move-In.Penalties pre move-in or within 30 days: What else, besides renter's insurance, move-in inspection, pest reporting and utilities, can I be penalized for if not completed before move-in or within 30 days of moving in? Just provide the results and details only

Maintenance.Standard Maintenance Phone Number: What is the phone number to call for standard maintenance issues? Please only return the phone number in the (000) 000-0000 format
Maintenance.Emergency Maintenance Phone Number: What is the phone number to call for emergency maintenance issues? Please only return the phone number in the (000) 000-0000 format
Maintenance.After-Hours Maintenance Phone Number: What is the phone number to call for after-hours maintenance issues? Please only return the phone number in the (000) 000-0000 format
Maintenance.State Rules: [Pull from State Law tab (Column F) based on state lease is in]

Utilities.Electricity Payment Responsibility: Who is responsible for paying Electricity? Landlord or Tenant? If not explicitly mentioned, return 'Not Specified'
Utilities.Gas Payment Responsibility: Who is responsible for paying Gas? Landlord or Tenant? If not explicitly mentioned, return 'Not Specified'
Utilities.Water Payment Responsibility: Who is responsible for paying Water? Landlord or Tenant? If not explicitly mentioned, return 'Not Specified'
Utilities.Heat Responsibility: Who is responsible for paying Heat? Landlord or Tenant? If not explicitly mentioned, return 'Not Specified'
Utilities.Trash and Recycling Payment Responsibili: Who is responsible for paying Trash and Recycling? Landlord or Tenant? If not explicitly mentioned, return 'Not Specified'
Utilities.Cable Responsibility: Who is responsible for paying Cable/TV? Landlord or Tenant? If not explicitly mentioned, return 'Not Specified'
Utilities.Internet Responsibility: Who is responsible for paying Internet? Landlord or Tenant? If not explicitly mentioned, return 'Not Specified'
Utilities.Landscaping Responsibility: Who is responsible for paying Landscaping? Landlord or Tenant? If not explicitly mentioned, return 'Not Specified'
Utilities.Snow Removal Responsibility: Who is responsible for paying Snow Removal? Landlord or Tenant? If not explicitly mentioned, return 'Not Specified'
Utilities.Third Party Billing Used: Does the landlord use a third-party billing company?

Rules and Regulations.Pets Allowed: Are pets allowed in the property? Yes/No
Rules and Regulations.Smoking Allowed: Is smoking allowed in the property? Yes/No
Rules and Regulations.Prohibited Activities: Not including smoking, can you provide a complete list of all prohibited activities and restrictions outlined in the lease agreement, including those specified in any addendums?

Landlord Notice.Notice to Enter Rules: What are the notice to enter rules in my lease?
Landlord Notice.State Rules: [Pull from State Law tab (Column G) based on state lease is in]

Renewal and Move-Outs.Lease End Date: In the least amount of words possible, what is the lease end date? Please return the date only and nothing else in the MMMM, DD, YYYY format
Renewal and Move-Outs.Notice to Vacate Date: In the least amount of words possible, what is the notice to vacate deadline date? Please return the date only and nothing else in the MMMM, DD, YYYY format
Renewal and Move-Outs.Consequences of missing notice to vacate: What happens if I miss the notice to vacate deadline?
Renewal and Move-Outs.Actions if not renewing and moving out: What do I need to do if I am not renewing and moving out?
Renewal and Move-Outs.Early lease termination: Can I terminate my lease early?
Renewal and Move-Outs.State Rules for Notice Period on Raising: [Pull from State Law tab (Column H) based on state lease is in]
Renewal and Move-Outs.State Rules for Month-to-Month Landlord: [Pull from State Law tab (Column I) based on state lease is in]

Data Fields to Collect.Street Address of Property: What is the street address of the property?
Data Fields to Collect.City of Property: What city is the property in?
Data Fields to Collect.State of Property: What state is the property in?
Data Fields to Collect.Zip Code of Property: What is the five digit zip code of the property?
Data Fields to Collect.Number of Bedrooms: How many bedrooms are in the property?
Data Fields to Collect.Number of Bathrooms: How many bathrooms are in the property?
